com.poesys.accounting.db.account

Interface IAccount

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto>, com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto, com.poesys.db.dto.IObserver, com.poesys.db.dto.ISubject, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICapitalAccount, IDistributionAccount, ISimpleAccount
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAccount, AbstractAccountProxy, AbstractCapitalAccount, AbstractCapitalAccountProxy, AbstractDistributionAccount, AbstractDistributionAccountProxy, AbstractSimpleAccount, AbstractSimpleAccountProxy, Account, AccountProxy, CapitalAccount, CapitalAccountProxy, DistributionAccount, DistributionAccountProxy, SimpleAccount, SimpleAccountProxy

    public interface IAccount
extends com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto

    A data-access layer data-transfer-object interface for the Account. The data-transfer-object class and proxy class implement this interface, as does the business-layer data-transfer-object class.

    A division of the accounting system representing an individual accounting element; divided into assets, liabilities, and equity on the balance sheet or income or expense on the income statement; owned by an accounting entity

    Stereotypes:

    • CompositeKey
    • Persistent

    Class is read/write: true

    Author:
    Poesys/DB Cartridge
